md.name: descriptive
md.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/"><dc:title xsi:type="dcterms:cs">Aplikace DRG v České republice</dc:title><dcterms:translated xsi:type="dcterms:en">The application of the DRG system in the Czech Republic</dcterms:translated><dcterms:alternative></dcterms:alternative><dcterms:alternativeTranslated></dcterms:alternativeTranslated><dc:studyID> </dc:studyID><dc:creator>Roubal, Tomáš</dc:creator><dcterms:dateofbirth xsi:type="dcterms:W3CDTF">1981</dcterms:dateofbirth><dc:subject></dc:subject><dc:description xsi:type="dcterms:cs">Cílem práce je na základě analýzy užitkových funkcí aktérů trhu nemocničních služeb posoudit možný vliv systému DRG na růst efektivity produkce tohoto sektoru. Hlavním nástrojem této analýzy je jednoduchý model trhu nemocničních služeb, který v teoretické rovině srovnává úhradový mechanismu plateb za nemocniční služby per diem se systémem DRG. Tento model ukazuje na možný nárůst efektivity produkce nemocničních služeb zavedením systému DRG.</dc:description><dc:publisher>Univerzita Karlova v Praze</dc:publisher><dcterms:advisor>Háva, Petr</dcterms:advisor><dcterms:referee></dcterms:referee><dcterms:created xsi:type="dcterms:W3CDTF">2005</dcterms:created><dcterms:dateAccepted xsi:type="dcterms:W3CDTF">2005</dcterms:dateAccepted><dc:status></dc:status><dc:type>diplomová práce</dc:type><dc:format xsi:type="dcterms:IMT">application.pdf</dc:format><dc:identifier></dc:identifier><dc:language xsi:type="dcterms:ISO 639-1">cs</dc:language><dc:rights></dc:rights><dcterms:name>Mgr.</dcterms:name><dcterms:level>magisterský</dcterms:level><dcterms:discipline></dcterms:discipline><dcterms:grantor>Univerzita Karlova v Praze. Fakulta sociálních věd. Institut ekonomických studií</dcterms:grantor><dc:collection>dp</dc:collection><dc:collection></dc:collection><dc:description xsi:type="dcterms:en">The aim of this thesis is to analyse the utility functions of the most important actors of the hospital services market and to evaluate the potential growth of efficiency of these services after introduction of Diagnosis Related Groups system of financing. The main tool of this analysis in a simple model of market of hospital services. The model compares on the theoretical level the system of financing of hospital services in the per diem system and the DRG system. This model shows the potential growth of the efficiency of production of hospital goods and services under the DRG system.</dc:description></record>
